nodes.documentation: @title Boosto Pool
nodes.name: BoostoPool

nodes.documentation: @dev Creates a new pool
@dev Checks if the pool is still open or not
nodes.name: isPoolOpen

nodes.documentation: @dev Checks if the pool is closed
nodes.name: isPoolClosed

nodes.documentation: @dev Checks if the pool is finished successfully
nodes.name: isPoolFinished

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier for check msg.value
nodes.name: checkInvestAmount

nodes.documentation: @dev check if the sender is already invested
nodes.name: notInvestedYet

nodes.documentation: @dev check if the sender is admin
nodes.name: isAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev fallback function

@dev Allows the admin to tranfer ETH to SC 
when bounus is in ETH
nodes.name: adminDropETH

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the admin to withdraw remaining token and ETH when
the pool is closed and not reached the goal(no rewards)
nodes.name: adminWithdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev Selects a random winner and transfer the funds.
This function could fail when the selected wallet is a duplicate winner
and need to try again to select an another random investor.
When we have N winners, the admin need to call this function N times. This is 
not an efficient method but since we have just a few winners it will work fine.
nodes.name: adminAddWinner

nodes.documentation: @dev Selects a random winner among all investors
nodes.name: random
getWalletInfoByIndex
getWalletInfo
